actions.comment: play a video advertisement after every 2 rounds

then.message: You are a zombie now! If you're stuck, press [Z] to teleport to spawn position
Double Gainz: Humans will receive 2x gains during outbreak.
Juke-Only: All objects are gone, only option is to juke.
Crazy Debris: The size of debris has been randomized!
Zombie Party: More people will be sick this round! Watch out!
Extra Items: Exclusive items are in the shop!
The pirate ship has arrived at the beach! Press B at it to buy special items.

actions.comment: MISSIONS HAVE ORDERS! SEE allMissionsKey FOR THE ORDER!

textB.textB: for completing the mission: "First Player to get 100k"
for completing the mission: "First Player to be the Last Survivor"
for completing the mission: "First Player to Obtain a Rare Item"
for completing the mission: "First Player to Kill a Player Holding a Mystic Crystal"
for completing the mission: "First player to obtain 2 rare items in a single round"

actions.value:
Missions

value.textB:
Uh oh!

You must create an account to participate in missions and earn coins!

actions.message: Giving coins failed because game owner does not have enough coins or the daily transfer limit was reached.
Please report the issue to us on the Braains discord server: https://discord.gg/dPvp5vNMmG
If this does not appear, please contact us on Discord

textB.textB:
,

Welcome to Braains.io!
[H] to open this again

Controls:
[WASD] or [Arrow Keys] to move
[Mouse] to rotate
[Left Click] to use item
[B] to buy item
[E] to pickup item on ground
[G] to drop item from your hotbar to the ground
[Z] to teleport to spawn (for zombies only, 60s cooldown)

You must be logged in to use the following features:
[ENTER] to open and send chat message
[M] to open the current server's missions (earn moddCoins!)
You can register an account by click the top left 'MENU' button and clicking 'Login'. Need help? Click the Discord icon below the 'Play' button!

Badges (next to name): = Verified Youtuber, = Moderator, = Developer

Have fun!
Devs

customInputModalMessage.default:
Custom input modal:

This was made with the purpose of helping our moderators ensure rule breakers get caught & punished.
Commands:

/sp [player] - select a player (you can also select a player by right-clicking them).

/swm [message] - send warning message to selected player.

/viewlogs - view logs of selected player.

/spectate - toggle spectator mode.

/reveal - reveal staff that are in-game (you can toggle incognito mode by pressing "y").

Please type the command in the box below:

allMissionsNames.default: [" 20 - First to get 100k Score"," 20 - First to be the Last Survivor"," 5 - First to get a Rare Item"," 5 - First to Kill a Mystic Crystal Holder"," 20 - First to obtain 2 rare items in a single round"," 20 - First to survive 8 rounds in a row"]

settings.menudiv: Welcome to Braains.io! Can you survive the apocalypse? Navigate the chaotic town on foot, build forts with furniture and hunker down in rooms, or maybe even hide under a tree! The longer and deadlier your survival lasts, the more points you get, making you stronger and faster! If you get infected, don't fret! You can infect others and get 60% of their points! Time is of the essence: buy weapons, forge alliances, and most of all: don't lose your braains!
